channel.title: investor pack on Argolon Solutions
channel.description: Recent content in investor pack on Argolon Solutions

item.title: LouderVoice BES 2009 (Business Expansion Scheme)
item.description: The LouderVoice customer reviews system for business has moved into high-gear in 2009. Clients are deploying our EasyReview widget on their e-commerce sites every week. Our first US customer will go live this month along with many more Irish sites. Our second UK site will go live early in the new year. The most recent research by Internet Retailer tells you everything you need to know about how important reviews are to businesses.
